com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption

Class DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production.AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass>>
      • com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.consumption.DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    TDomainClass - The type of datum for which a DatumConsumer is to be built.

    public class DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass>
extends AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass>>
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumConsumer.

      • registerConsumptionEndPointType

        public <TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint,UConsumptionEndPoint extends TConsumptionEndPoint> DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass> registerConsumptionEndPointType(Class<TConsumptionEndPoint> consumptionEndPointType,
                                                                                                                                                                      DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<UConsumptionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory)
        Registers a ConsumptionEndPoint type. After the registration, data can be consumed from an instance of this endpoint type.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPointType - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory - a DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory capable of building DatumEnvelopeFetchers from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        a DatumConsumerBuilder instance capable of consuming data from the specified consumption endpoint type.

      • consumeDataFrom

        public DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass> consumeDataFrom(ConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint,
                                                 DatumSerDe<TDomainClass> datumSerDe)
        Adds a consumption endpoint to consume data from, using the specified DatumSerDe instance.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPoint - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumSerDe - the DatumSerDe instance to use to serialize data.
        Returns:
        a DatumConsumerBuilder instance configured with the specified consumption endpoint and serialization method.

      • consumeDataFrom

        public DatumConsumerBuilder<TDomainClass> consumeDataFrom(ConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint,
                                                 DatumSerDe<TDomainClass> datumSerDe,
                                                 com.google.common.base.Predicate<TDomainClass> datumFilter)
        Adds a consumption endpoint to consume data from, using the specified DatumSerDe and filter instances.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPoint - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumSerDe - the DatumSerDe instance to use to serialize data.
        datumFilter - a filter to apply before delivering data.
        Returns:
        a DatumConsumerBuilder instance configured with the specified consumption endpoint, serialization method and filter.
